summary: You can now craft and temper the Headsman\'s Axe
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Craftable/Temperable Headsman\'s Axe~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~By Alfatossa~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



INTALLATION:

-Put the \"Craft_Temper_Headsman\'s Axe.esp\" file in your \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data\" folder
-Activate it in the data file tab on the Skyrim launcher
-Enjoy!





DESCRITION:

You can now craft and temper the \"Headsman\'s Axe\" at the forge the axe is located in the \"Iron Smithing\" tab.
This axe is the one that the headsman have at the beginning of the game or at your first visit in Solitude.






















~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Hope you enjoy this mod!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
author: Alfatossa
